title: Build laser cutting artworks showcase website

requirements.text: Create a homepage with hero section showcasing laser cutting artworks, highlighting creativity, precision, and unique solutions for gifting, home décor, and industrial applications

quotes: specialize in laser cutting artworks that blend creativity with precision, offering unique solutions for gifting, home décor, and industrial applications

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays compelling visual of laser cutting artworks
Clear messaging about specialization in gifts, home décor, and industrial applications
Call-to-action buttons for exploring products or contacting business

requirements.text: Build a product gallery showcasing three main categories: customized gifts, elegant decorative pieces, and accurate industrial components

quotes: From customized gifts and elegant decorative pieces to accurate industrial components

acceptanceCriteria: Gallery organized into three distinct categories
Each category displays representative product examples
Products show high-quality images with descriptions
Navigation between categories is intuitive

requirements.text: Create an About section highlighting innovative ideas, advanced laser technology, focus on originality, durability, and flawless finishing, with emphasis on serving the Pune market

quotes: Our designs are thoughtfully crafted using innovative ideas and advanced laser technology
we bring new and contemporary designs to the Pune market
With a strong focus on originality, durability, and flawless finishing

acceptanceCriteria: About section describes innovative design approach and laser technology
Highlights key values: originality, durability, flawless finishing
Mentions Pune market presence
Professional presentation of company philosophy

requirements.text: Implement a contact form for inquiries about custom orders, quotes, and general questions
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form accepts name, email, phone, and message
Form validates required fields
Backend stores inquiry submissions
Success confirmation shown after submission

requirements.text: Create services overview section detailing offerings for gifting solutions, home décor products, and industrial applications

quotes: offering unique solutions for gifting, home décor, and industrial applications

acceptanceCriteria: Three service categories clearly defined
Each category includes description and benefits
Visual representation for each service area
Links or navigation to relevant product examples

requirements.text: Design a creative, modern visual theme with warm, sophisticated colors that convey craftsmanship and precision, using clean typography and spacious layouts that highlight the artistry of laser-cut products
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette reflects craftsmanship and modern design
Typography is clean and professional
Layout emphasizes product imagery and detail
Consistent visual style across all pages
Design conveys precision and quality

requirements.text: Render generated product showcase images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated
Images display correctly in gallery and showcase sections
Proper image optimization and loading

constraints: Use single-actor Motoko architecture for backend
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: hooks/useInternetIdentity, hooks/useActor, main.tsx, components/ui
Follow React + TypeScript + Tailwind + React Query stack
nonGoals: E-commerce shopping cart or checkout system

required: Hero banner showing intricate laser-cut artwork with dramatic lighting and detailed patterns (hero-banner.dim_1920x800.png)
Customized gift examples including personalized wooden plaques and decorative frames (gift-showcase.dim_800x600.png)
Elegant home décor pieces featuring geometric wall art and ornamental designs (decor-showcase.dim_800x600.png)
Industrial precision components showing mechanical parts and technical applications (industrial-showcase.dim_800x600.png)
Laser cutting process visualization showing technology and precision at work (laser-process.dim_1200x800.png)
Company workshop setting with laser cutting equipment (workshop-photo.dim_1200x800.png)
